messages.messageBody:
>
>
>>> > racism... the demeaning portrayal of women... porno... spanking
>>
>>
kids... abuse

>>> > of animals... political agendas..
>>
>>
>
>
>
>>> > Just for the record, *sheltering* or *denial* are not in my mind, but
>>> > protecting and guiding are, especially because my dd is still very
>>
>>
young.

>>
>
>


>> Why would she *want* to watch or participate in that list of things?
>
>

Did I say that? I don't remember saying that, but I meant to be exposed to:
I don't necessarily agree on how women (or men, or kids) are portrayed on certain TV shows.
My dd does not surf the net (yet) but I get a bunch of porno junk mail without asking for it.
Some people spank their kids in public.
Disturbing (and graphic) news on TV about murder, abuse, etc.

Yol
